effect.x_y: Lowers the target’s Attack and Special Attack by two stages. User faints.

short_effect.x_y: Lowers the target’s Attack and Special Attack by two stages. User faints.

flavor_text.x_y: The user faints when using this move. In return, this harshly lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user faints when using this move. In return, this harshly lowers the target’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats.
